description:
Find Anyone Online with Ease – The Ultimate AI Powered People Search & Social Media Lookup App!

Ever wondered where to find social profiles of someone you just met? Looking to reconnect with an old friend or check out a new acquaintance's social media presence? Our powerful DeepSearch AI Search Assistant app helps you discover publicly available information about individuals effortlessly – all in one place!

With just a name, our AI Search Assistant scans multiple platforms, letting you find people online quickly and conveniently. No more endless searching across multiple websites—our social media profile discovery tool consolidates everything in a single, easy-to-use interface.


• Why Choose Our People Search & Social Media Lookup App?
- Find Social Profiles Easily – Search by name, phone number, email, or username to locate social media accounts across various platforms.
- Comprehensive Background Search – Access publicly available records, images, videos, and other relevant information about people.
- Find Friends Online – Reconnect with lost contacts, old classmates, or former colleagues in just a few taps.
- Social Media Discovery – Get insights into someone’s online presence, including publicly available professional and personal information.
- Stay Informed – Instantly see what’s trending and discover who’s being searched the most.
- Quick & Simple Searches – Our intuitive interface makes finding people online fast, efficient, and hassle-free.


• Powerful Features at Your Fingertips!
- Advanced Social Media Finder: Locate someone’s social accounts, including any social media accounts.
- Cross-Platform Search – Save time by searching multiple sources at once instead of manually browsing different websites.
- Publicly Available Background Info – See professional details, online mentions, and other insights about individuals.
- Find PPL Online in Just Seconds – Enter a name or username, and we’ll handle the rest.
- Search History & Popular Searches – Keep track of your previous searches and explore the most searched individuals.
- Privacy & Transparency – We only provide publicly accessible information, ensuring ethical and responsible use.


•Who Can Benefit from This App?
- Networking Enthusiasts: Whether you're at a business event or meeting someone new, find their online profiles instantly.
- Recruiters & Employers: Look up professional backgrounds to make informed hiring decisions.
- Journalists & Researchers: Gather publicly available data for articles, reports, and investigations.
- Curious Individuals: Learn more about friends, colleagues, or even public figures without the hassle of searching manually.
- Online Daters: Verify someone’s online and publicly available presence before taking the next step.


No more guesswork or endless web searches! Whether you're trying to find social profiles, reconnect with a friend, or conduct a background search, our app delivers fast and accurate results using publicly available data.


UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES
- You can subscribe for unlimited access to all app’s features.
- Subscriptions are billed automatically at the rate depending on the selected subscription plan.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service:
Privacy Policy: https://deepsearchai.app/privacy
Terms of Use:  https://deepsearchai.app/terms

AlMosaly is the largest Islamic app, your companion in your day, with + 40 M Muslims worldwide, with new services and surprises. 
enjoy Azan and prayer times with complete accuracy according to your country and city, in addition to many features, such as (complete supplications, the Qur’an with the Khatmah, supplications, supplications, Qiblah, rosary, legal ruqyah, accounting verses, your obediences, and more) with everything you need in your daily and devotional life, it is the best companion for you in your life.

BENEFITS OF AlMosaly FOR MUSLIMS:

- Salah Times: The app provides location-based Islamic prayer times and pre-Azan notifications, enabling users to pray with precision and timeliness.
- Azan: The app features azan pray times, providing audible reminders for prayer times.
- Nearby Mosques: The app locates mosques in the vicinity, saving users the effort of searching for them during prayer times. 
- Qibla Finder: In 5 accurate ways, it features an electronic compass that accurately indicates the qibla direction with a clear illustration.
- The Holy Quran: Users have access to the Holy Quran, complete with translations in various recitations.
- Azkar: The app includes morning and evening remembrances (Morning Athkar and Evening Athkar), along with personalized Azkar notifications throughout the day.
- Dua: It offers Muslim supplications from the Quran and the Quran and Prophet's Sunnah
- Tasbih: Users can utilize an electronic Tasbih during waiting times or at other suitable moments.
- The Hijri Calendar: This feature includes important Islamic dates, such as Ramadan 2025.
- Multi-Language Support: AlMosaly provides content in more than one language to cater to Muslims around the globe.

With a simple, user-friendly interface and customization options, the app allows modifications in the calculation of prayer times based on different sects
Designed for Muslims worldwide, AlMosaly app serves as an essential companion in their daily lives, enhancing their faith through intelligent reminders and reliable resources. It is an indispensable application for Muslim smartphones.




“Download the AlMosaly app now and maintain a lifelong connection to your Islamic practices.”




Join us on social media:

Instagram: www.instagram.com/mosalyapp
Twitter: twitter.com/almosallyapp

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Aqar is the leading real estate app in Saudi Arabia, built to serve users searching for all types of properties including apartments, villas, lands, buildings, floors, houses, rooms, shops, offices, rest houses, chalets, farms, and more whether for sale or long-term and short-term rent.
With over 12 million downloads and 400 million monthly property searches, Aqar is the number 1 choice for users across the Kingdom.

Top Features of the Aqar App:
Explore Properties with Aqar Map
Browse thousands of listings through an interactive map covering all cities and regions in Saudi Arabia. You can easily define your search area and explore listings in Riyadh, Jeddah, Dammam, and more. The map also highlights key nearby landmarks like Riyadh Metro.

Smart and Advanced Filters
Search by neighborhood, price, area, number of rooms, property type, posting date, and more. Whether you're looking for residential or commercial properties, for buying or renting, the app helps you find exactly what you need.

Verified and Licensed Listings
All property listings are licensed by the General Authority for Real Estate, and all advertisers are verified via the National Single Sign-On (Nafath). Aqar is also integrated with official government platforms to ensure trust and credibility.

Ejar Rental Contracts
The app is fully integrated with the official Ejar platform to simplify the process of digitally verifying and managing your rental contracts with ease.

Direct Daily and Monthly Booking
Book your rest house, chalet, farm, or furnished unit directly within the app. Perfect for short stays, vacations, or temporary housing ideal for those looking for homes in Saudi Arabia for daily or monthly rental.

Property Request Feature
No need to search every day! Simply submit your desired property details, and the app will send instant notifications when a matching listing becomes available.

Neighborhood Price Insights
Get updated average property prices in each neighborhood, based on accurate market data from Aqar and the Real Estate Exchange, helping you make informed buying or renting decisions.

Aqar Plus – Premium Tools for Property Seekers
– Search inside listing descriptions
– View your favorite listings on the map
– Monitor ad performance in detail
– Browse listings posted by property owners
– Save up to 20 active property requests
– Unlock exclusive marketing and filtering features

Rent Now, Pay Later 
A flexible rental financing service offered in partnership with trusted providers like Rise and Ijari, allowing you to pay your rent in easy monthly installments, all within the app.

Aqar In Numbers:
- SAR 233 Billion worth of properties listed
- Over 400 million monthly property searches
- Over 2 million monthly active users

Whether you’re looking to buy, rent, or invest, for daily, monthly, or long-term housing, Aqar is your smart companion in the Saudi real estate market.

Choose from our services and book effortlessly through our app. Enjoy top-quality at-home services from trusted and verified professionals.

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is your comprehensive Islamic companion, designed to support your daily spiritual journey. With essential features like accurate prayer time reminders, Azkar collection, and Qibla direction, it helps strengthen your faith and manage your daily worship seamlessly.

Key Features:

* Accurate Prayer Times: Never miss a prayer again! Get precise notifications for all Salah times (Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) based on your location.
* Azkar & Duas: Immerse yourself in spiritual invocations with a curated collection of Azkar and Duas, perfect for morning, evening, and every moment in between. Strengthen your connection with Allah through heartfelt invocations.
* Tasbih Counter: Elevate your Dhikr practice with the built-in Tasbih Counter. This feature includes an electronic tasbih and prayer bead counter to help you track your count while reciting your prayer or Dua.
* Qibla Direction: Find the Qibla direction accurately, no matter where you are. The integrated Qibla compass ensures precise alignment for your prayers.
* Quran Access: Read and reflect on the Holy Quran directly within the app. The clear and user-friendly interface allows for easy navigation between chapters and verses, supporting your daily recitation goals.
* Prayer Reminders: Never miss a prayer with customizable reminders that fit your routine. Whether it's a gentle nudge for Fajr or a midday reminder for Dhuhr, you'll stay connected to your worship schedule.

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is designed to be your trusted spiritual companion, integrating faith seamlessly into your daily routine. Whether you're managing prayer times, reflecting on Quranic verses, or seeking solace in Azkar and Duas, this app supports your spiritual growth and devotion.

Download now and experience the convenience, guidance, and fulfillment of having a complete Islamic companion right at your fingertips. Stay connected to your faith, no matter where life takes you.

description:
تطبيق إحسان، التابع لمنصة إحسان الوطنية للعمل الخيري التي تشرف عليها اثنتا عشرة جهة رسمية، يوفر التطبيق تجربة سهلة وموثوقة للمحسنين عبر عرض العديد من فرص التبرع في مختلف مجالات الخير المتعددة داخل وخارج المملكة للفئات الأشد استحقاقاً، بما يسهم في تعظيم الأجر وتحقيق قيم التكافل المجتمعي.

مميزات التطبيق:
•    سهولة الاستخدام والتبرع بسرعة وموثوقية.
•    فرص تبرع متنوعة المجالات ومحدثة باستمرار.
•    الاستفادة من برامج المنصة وخدماتها ومزاياها.
•    إدارة الملف الشخصي والاطلاع على الإحصائيات والتقارير.

description:
Bayut KSA: Saudi Arabia's Premier Real Estate App

Bayut KSA brings a transformative experience to real estate search in The Kingdom. Whether you're looking to buy a cozy apartment in Riyadh, rent a spacious villa, or find a furnished apartment for rent, Bayut KSA offers unparalleled access to properties for sale and rent across Saudi Arabia.

Navigating the real estate market in Saudi Arabia has never been more straightforward. With Bayut KSA, whether you're interested in the bustling neighbourhoods of Riyadh or the serene landscapes of Jeddah, we cover it all—houses, apartments, villas, and even real estate offices.

Key Features of Bayut KSA:

Property Search: Easily find your next home or investment. Filter searches by location, price, and type—from villas to apartments, and everything in between.
Detailed Listings: Each listing is packed with essential details, high-quality images, floor plans, and exclusive amenities to guide your decision.
Favourites & Alerts: Save your favourite properties and receive alerts on new listings that meet your criteria, ensuring you never miss out.
Arabic Support: Full Arabic language support makes your search comfortable and effective, catering specifically to our local users.
User-Friendly Interface: An intuitive and sleek interface allows for effortless navigation and a smoother property search experience.
Contact Agents: Directly connect with professional real estate agents via phone, SMS, WhatsApp, or email to arrange viewings or get more details.
Property Insights: Stay ahead with updates on market trends and real estate news within Saudi Arabia.


Whether you're searching for an investment property or a place to call home, Bayut KSA simplifies it all. 

Dive into the real estate market with Bayut KSA and experience a seamless property-finding journey. Download the app for free today and step closer to finding your dream property!

Discover More About Bayut KSA:
Visit our website at Bayut KSA and follow us on our social media channels to stay updated with the latest property trends and offers.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bayutksa/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bayutksa?lang=en
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bayutksa/
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bayutsa
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@bayutksa2962


We're eager to hear your feedback!

We connect you with professional providers for beauty, maintenance, pet care, tailoring, car services, and more.
Just browse, choose your service and provider, pick a time, and enjoy.
 
With easy booking and secure payments, HelloApp brings convenience to every order.


خدماتك توصلك بضغطة زر. اطلب من الخدمات المتنوعة مع هلوآب.
 
نربطك مع مقدمي خدمات محترفين في مجالات الجمال، الصيانة، رعاية الحيوانات الأليفة، التفصيل، خدمات السيارات، وأكثر.
تصفح، اختر خدمتك ومقدم الخدمة، حدد الوقت، واستمتع.
 
مع حجز سهل ومدفوعات آمنة، يقدم هلوآب الراحة في كل طلب.

قلبنا الفكرة! وغيرنا الأسلوب القديم والمرهق في عملية البحث عن العقارات!
في تطبيق ديل لا تبحث عن العروض العقارية لكن اطلب عقارك بنفسك وين ما كنت في المملكة العربية السعودية، من خلال واجهة سهلة الاستخدام وواضحة التفاصيل. الآن آلاف الوسطاء العقاريين المهتمين بطلباتك ينتظرونك ومستعدين لتقديم عروض عقارية تناسبك حسب مواصفات طلباتك الخاصة عبر التواصل الفوري (المحادثة المباشرة داخل التطبيق أو الاتصال الهاتفي أو الواتساب). 

مميزات التطبيق لمقدم الطلب:  
- لا يوجد أي عملية بحث أو عروض عقارية مُجهدة.
- سهولة الحصول على الوحدة العقارية من خلال رفع الطلب الشخصي مباشرة مع كتابة المواصفات المرغوبة. 
- إمكانية الحصول على العديد من العروض العقارية القريبة لمواصفاتك واختيار ما يناسبك.
- الربط المباشر بينك وبين الوسيط أو العقاري المناسب والأقرب لك عن طريق (دردشة مباشرة - اتصال هاتفي - واتساب).
- المحافظة على الوقت والجهد المبذول في عمليات البحث العقارية المطلوبة.

مميزات التطبيق للعقاري:
- وجود قناة فاعلة لتسويق عقاراتك مباشرة على مقدمي الطلبات.
- ميزة توسيع قاعدة العملاء عبر إيصال طلبات عقارية تتقاطع مع اهتمامك.
- سهولة البحث في الطلبات العقارية (حسب المنطقة ونوع العقار).
- الربط المباشر بينك وبين مقدم الطلب عن طريق (دردشة مباشرة - اتصال هاتفي - واتساب).
- إمكانية تفعيل التنبيهات عند توفر طلب متوافق مع اهتماماتك العقارية.

-

نسعى في تطبيق ديل إلى زيادة فاعلية التواصل في القطاع العقاري عبر جمع كل الطلبات العقارية في مكان واحد يسهل على (الوسطاء والمطورون العقاريين) تقديم خدماتهم بشكل مميز وسهل (لمقدمي الطلبات العقارية) في جميع أنحاء المملكة. كما نختصر الجهد والوقت على طالب العقار الذي يجد تحدي كبير في الوصول إلى العروض العقارية المناسبة والمتوافقة مع طلبه ورغباته.

Connect your IoT home appliances to the LG ThinQ app.
Enjoy effortless product control, smart care, and convenient automation in one simple solution.

■ Discover the convenience of smart home appliances through the Home tab.
 - Control your IoT home appliances from anywhere with our app.
 - Get personalized recommendations for managing appliances based on usage history.
 - Find out ways to better make use of the app's features from "Explore"
■ Upgrade your products from ThinQ Play.
 - Use your products more efficiently and with greater ease by introducing new features to products you are currently using.
 - Upgrade your products based on your lifestyle and personal preferences.
■ Monitor your energy consumption data quickly.
 - Use Energy Monitoring to compare your power usage with your neighbors’.
 - Set energy saving goals and get usage status notifications to help save energy more efficiently.
 - Receive care services for your products all in one place.
■ Handle everything from troubleshooting to service requests directly from the app.
 - Use the Smart Diagnosis function to check your product’s status.
 - Book a service visit from a professional engineer for an accurate diagnosis and inspection.
■ Conveniently reference LG home appliance manuals in one place.
 - Access a range of content, including function descriptions and essential usage solutions for products.

※ Services and features may vary depending on your product model and your country or region of residence.

The following access permissions are necessary for the ThinQ app. 
All the access permissions requested are optional access permission, so even if you do not allow them, you can still use the app except for the related services. (Including OS Request Permissions such as "Siri & Search", "Notification", "Background App Refresh", and "Cellular Data")

[Optional Access Permissions]
• Location
- To find and connect to nearby Wi-Fi when registering the product.
- To set and save the home location in Manage Home
- To search for and use information about current locations, such as weather.
- To check your current location in the "Smart Routines" function.

• Camera
- To take a profile picture
- To share a home or account scanned from a QR code.
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product..(미국 Only)
- To use the AI oven Cooking Record feature.
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information

Quickly and easily connect and control your smart home devices through SmartThings.
SmartThings is compatible with 100s of smart home brands. So you can control all of your smart home gadgets in one place, including your Samsung Smart TV and smart home appliances.
With SmartThings, you can connect, monitor and control multiple smart home devices quicker and easier. Connect your Samsung smart TVs, smart appliances, smart speakers and brands like Ring, Nest and Philips Hue - all from one app.
Then control your smart devices using voice assistants including Google Assistant

[Key Features]
- Control and check in on your home from wherever you are
- Connect your smart devices across many different brands to work together by setting ‘scenes’
- Build routines that are set on time, weather, and device status, so your home runs smoothly in the background
- Allow shared control by giving access to other users
- Receive status updates about your devices with automated notifications
- Talk to your devices using Google Assistant
- Track, monitor and save money on energy with SmartThings Energy. See how much your home and compatible Samsung devices cost to run, and try various energy saving features, such as AI saving mode, or schedule devices to run during off peak hours.
- Receive recipe recommendations by scanning meal kits, wine, and meat. Plan, shop and prep meals with the help of SmartThings Cooking 

※ Some features may not be available in all countries.

[App requirements]
Some mobile devices may not be supported.
- iOS 16.0 or later / iPhone 6s or later / iPad mini 4 or later

※ App permissions
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed. 

[Required access permissions]
-
 
[Optional access permissions]
• Bluetooth: to find nearby devices using Bluetooth or BLE
• Microphone: Used to set up ultrasonic sensor-equipped devices
• Camera: Scan QR codes.
• Location: to automate actions using GPS (GPS optional)
                    Used to find Wi-Fi information to add devices with iOS 13 or later versions
• Contacts: Used to verify user information that will be used when sending text messages
